original_text: The kings of the earth, and all the inhabitants of the world, would not have believed that the adversary and the enemy should have entered into the gates of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 대적과 원수가 예루살렘 성문으로 들어갈 줄은 세상의 모든 왕들과 천하 모든 백성이 믿지 못하였었도다

sentences.original_text: and all the inhabitants of the world
that the adversary and the enemy
should have entered into the gates of Jerusalem
